title: Dirty Bombs and Nuclear Radiation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/8/17
itunes:title: Dirty Bombs and Nuclear Radiation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/8/17
description:
George Noory and guest James Mahaffey discuss the threat of terrorists obtaining nuclear material to create dirty bombs to cause destruction to a U.S. city.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
